entry.title: Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in March 2022
entry.summary: The most expensive items sold in March 2022 include a few classical albums, rare 7-inches from well-known bands, and an essential Ethiopian LP. A sought-after classical album from 1960 and the one and only pressing of Trios both attracted the attention of serious collectors. Classical records don’t always pop up on the most expensive list, […] The post Top 30 Most Expensive Items Sold on Discogs in March 2022 appeared first on Discogs Blog.
